solution_line_template: There are a total of {games_round_1}+{games_round_2}+{games_round_3}+{games_finals_round} = <<{games_round_1}+{games_round_2}+{games_round_3}+{games_finals_round}={total_games}>>{total_games} games of tennis in a typical tournament
If 1 game uses {cans_used_per_game} cans of tennis balls, then {total_games} games would use {total_games}*{cans_used_per_game} = {total_cans} cans of tennis balls
If 1 can of tennis balls has {balls_per_can_value} balls, then {total_cans} cans would have <<{total_cans}*{balls_per_can_value}={total_balls}>>{total_balls} balls
